alert.note: Alert for Cass; Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina; Richland; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 14 at 2:00PM CST until December 15 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 9 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches Thursday. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, light snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch through Wednesday night. * WHERE...Portions of the Red River Valley, including northwest and west central Minnesota and northeast and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 AM to 9 PM CST Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Heavy snow rates and blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes Thursday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
